title: Number of conference championship game appearances of NFL teams 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of appearances for 16 number of American Football Teamss.
The Number of appearances is appeared to be the highest at American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers and lowest at American Football Teams New York Giants.
The difference of Number of appearances between the highest and lowest American Football Teams is 11.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing American Football Teams in the x axis and Number of appearances in the y axis.
The maximum Number of appearances 16.0 is found at American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers and the minimum is found at New York Giants where American Football Teams is 5.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of appearances for 16 number of American Football Teamss.
The maximum Number of appearances 16.0 is found at American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers and the minimum is found at New York Giants where American Football Teams is 5.0.
The highest American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers has 11.0 more Number of appearances than the lowest American Football Teams New York Giants.
Number of appearances at American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers is 16.0 , second place is San Francisco 49ers at 16.0, and thirdly is New England Patriots at 15.0.
American Football Teams Miami Dolphins, Baltimore / Indianapolis Colts, and Philadelphia Eagles have a similar Number of appearances that is 7.0.
The highest value 16.0 at Pittsburgh Steelers is almost 1.7 times larger than the average value 9.44.
The Number of appearances is 151.0 if we add up values of all American Football Teamss.
